channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: China’s Hottest App Is a Daily Test of Whether You're Still Alive
item.description: Are You Dead Yet soared to the top of app store charts and became a magnet for investors. In an exclusive interview with WIRED, one of its creators says they’re changing the name anyway.

item.title: QWERTY Phones Are Really Trying to Make a Comeback This Year
item.description: Is the reason nostalgia? Frustration with the iPhone's worsening software keyboard? Boredom?

item.title: “2026 is the year we expect to see the AI PC crossover” - AMD head tells us why this will be the year of the AI PC, and why mini PCs are "really having a moment"
item.description: Exclusive: AMD head says 2026 will be a big year for AI PCs - but mini PCs will continue to go from strength to strength.

item.title: Apple's Google Gemini deal is the most disappointing thing to come out of Apple since the Newton
item.description: Apple promised us an exciting, more personalized Siri, and instead, we're getting more Gemini.

item.title: EA delays Battlefield 6 Season 2 to February 17
item.description: The second season of Battlefield 6 is being pushed back based on “community feedback.” On Tuesday, EA and Battlefield Studios said Season 2 will now arrive on February 17.Season 2 of Battlefield 6 had previously been scheduled for January 20, so we're looking at a delay of almost a month. As a consolation, the team is extending Season 1 through the start of the next season."During our ongoing development, we've continued to review community feedback and, in order to keep our promise, determined that our best path forward is to extend Season 1 and give ourselves extra time to further polish and...

item.title: How to watch Australian Open 2026 from anywhere with this VPN deal
item.description: How to watch Australian Open 2026 from anywhere in the world for free with this VPN deal.

item.title: Ce détail « nucléaire » explique pourquoi certaines sondes ne meurent jamais
item.description: L’exploration requiert des scientifiques qu’ils repoussent les limites de notre technologie, afin de porter des missions toujours plus ambitieuses. Pour cela, ils utilisent et améliorent depuis près de soixante ans l’énergie nucléaire, l’adaptant aux besoins des agences spatiales.

item.title: EPA Will No Longer Factor Health Costs Into Rules on Two Deadly Air Pollutants
item.description: The stunning reversal goes against the agency’s own mission statement.

item.title: Verizon gets FCC permission to end 60-day phone unlocking rule
item.description: Verizon can keep phones locked to its network for longer after the Federal Communications Commission agreed to waive the carrier's 60-day unlocking requirement, as reported by Ars Technica. Following this decision, Verizon must follow a looser set of guidelines set by the CTIA wireless trade group, which says carriers should only unlock a customer's postpaid […]...

item.title: Oops, all cover screen! The Ikko MindOne Pro is like a Galaxy Z Flip 7 without the flip
item.description: The Ikko MindOne Pro promises a cool new design for small phone lovers

item.title: What the Hell Are the Russo Brothers Talking About?
item.description: The 'Avengers: Doomsday' directors have us questioning the four teaser trailers, which apparently are neither teasers nor trailers.

item.title: Un smartphone ultra-endurant avec écran 120 Hz à moins de 130 € ? C’est possible qu’en période de soldes
item.description: Le très abordable Realme P3 Lite est une version allégée du P3 classique. Malgré des concessions techniques inévitables, ce smartphone présente quelques atouts. Le premier étant, bien sûr, son prix, qui passe de 159,99 euros à 129,99 euros sur Amazon pendant les soldes d'hiver 2026.

item.title: Nissan is one of the first carmakers to offer magnetic phone chargers in the US
item.description: Wireless phone chargers are now common in vehicles, but they're typically missing one very useful feature. Nissan announced last month that it will be the first automaker in the US to offer wireless chargers with a magnetic mount, ensuring charging coils remain aligned for faster charging of mobile devices, even while a vehicle is in […]

item.title: Google Pulls Some Health-Related AI Overviews as Industry Goes All-In on Healthcare
item.description: 2026 is the year AI companies want to handle your health.

item.title: Mercedes temporarily scraps its Level 3 ‘eyes-off’ driving feature
item.description: Mercedes-Benz is pausing the roll-out of Drive Pilot, an "eyes off" conditionally automated driving feature that was available in Europe and the US. As first reported by German publication Handelsblatt, the revised S-Class will not have the Level 3 system when it arrives at the end of this month. Mercedes was one of the first […]

item.title: Why Egnyte keeps hiring junior engineers despite the rise of AI coding tools
item.description: Egnyte, the $1.5 billion cloud content governance company, has embedded AI coding tools across its global team of more than 350 developers — but not to reduce headcount. Instead, the company continues to hire junior engineers, using AI to accelerate onboarding, deepen codebase understanding, and shorten the path from junior to senior contributor. The approach challenges a dominant 2025 narrative that automation will replace developers, showing instead how enterprises are using AI to scale engineering capacity while keeping humans firmly in the loop.“To have engineers disappear or us not hiring...

item.title: Thousands of n8n instances under threat from top security issue
item.description: Despite being patched weeks ago, Ni8mare is still plaguing almost 60,000 instances, new data claims.

item.title: AI music is flooding Spotify, and subscribers are furious — here’s why music fans 'no longer trust Discover Weekly'
item.description: Have you noticed AI-generated music in Spotify? These users have, and they're done with it.

item.title: Battlefield 6 Season One has just been extended with new bonus rewards to 'allow extra time to further develop and refine Season 2 as a result of community feedback'
item.description: Battlefield 6 players will now have longer to complete the Season One battle pass as developer Battlefield Studios announces its extension.

item.title: Neo humanoid maker 1X releases world model to help bots learn what they see
item.description: 1X released a new world model that it says is a solid step toward its robots being able to teach themselves new tasks.

item.title: A new 'more interactive' Hellblade is reportedly in the works, but Ninja Theory is no longer working on its 'experimental' Project Mara title
item.description: A new report claims that Ninja Theory is no longer working on Project Mara and is, instead, now developing a third installment in its Hellblade series.

item.title: Fnac et Darty vendent au rabais de nombreux produits Tech lors des soldes d’hiver 2026
item.description: À la veille de la 2e démarque des soldes, Fnac et Darty fait le plein d'offres : on trouve des smartphones premium en pack à prix cassé, des TV à moitié prix ou encore des laptops performants en réduction. Découvrez toutes les offres qui valent le coup.

item.title: Boulanger dégaine déjà ses meilleures offres avant la 2e démarque des soldes
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver battent leur plein et la deuxième démarque pointe déjà le bout de son nez. Chez Boulanger, les bonnes affaires s’enchaînent avec une pluie de réductions sur une large sélection de produits Tech. On a parcouru le site pour vous dénicher les meilleurs bons plans à ne surtout pas manquer.

item.title: The workout-friendly JBL Endurance Race 2 earbuds are on sale at Amazon for nearly half off
item.description: The JBL Endurance 2 earbuds are on sale at Amazon for $49.95, down from the list price of $89.95. That's a 44% discount.

item.title: Melinda French Gates says everyone should read this book
item.description: The philanthropist reads a little bit of this book nearly every day to reaffirm her purpose and recharge her batteries. In a recent interview with Wired, billionaire philanthropist Melinda French Gates made clear she is no friend of hustle culture and nonstop busyness.

item.title: Ce que Siri pourra faire grâce à Gemini
item.description: Gemini sera donc le nouveau cerveau de Siri. Apple fait en effet appel à Google et à ses modèles IA comme base pour les futures fonctions d'Apple Intelligence, et l'assistant sera un des premiers à en profiter. Reste à savoir pour quoi faire, et quelle sera la place de ChatGPT dans tout ça — car le bot d'OpenAI est déjà embarqué dans Siri…

item.title: Amazon lance une vague de promotions juste avant la 2e démarque des soldes
item.description: Même sans l’annoncer officiellement, Amazon casse les prix sur une multitude de produits Tech pendant les soldes. Et bonne nouvelle : la 2ᵉ démarque arrive à grands pas ! C’est le moment rêvé pour faire de vraies bonnes affaires et démarrer 2026 du bon pied.

item.title: The AI explosion isn't just hurting the prices of computers and consoles – it's coming for TVs and audio tech too
item.description: Price rises could be coming for all AV tech, and budget sets may get hit hardest

item.title: Google’s Veo now turns portrait images into vertical AI videos
item.description: Google is making its Veo 3.1 AI video model pay closer attention to the reference images you want generated clips to be based on. The company is releasing new visual improvements for the "Ingredients to Video" tool that was introduced last year, alongside expanding native vertical video support and resolution upscaling features. The Ingredients to […]...

item.title: Google’s update for Veo 3.1 lets users create vertical videos through reference images
item.description: Google is now allowing users to create vertical videos using references image.

item.title: Ponies release date: what time does the new Peacock TV show come out?
item.description: Emilia Clarke and Haley Lu Richardson's new spy thriller series arrives very soon – here's when and where you can watch it.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : quelles sont les meilleures offres à saisir sur Amazon, Fnac, Darty… ?
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver 2026 ont débuté la semaine dernière et les offres continuent de tomber sur Amazon, Fnac, Darty ou encore Cdiscount et Boulanger. Smartphones, PC portables, téléviseurs, tablettes ou encore casques et écouteurs sans fil… Voici les meilleures offres Tech sélectionnées par la rédaction pour cette fin de première démarque.

item.title: Meta confirms Reality Labs layoffs and shifts to invest more in wearables
item.description: Around 10 percent of Meta's Reality Labs division, which develops its XR products and services, will be laid off beginning on Tuesday, as reported by Bloomberg. Meta spokesperson Tracy Clayton confirmed the layoffs in a statement to The Verge: "We said last month that we were shifting some of our investment from Metaverse toward Wearables. […]

item.title: U.S. carbon pollution rose in 2025. Here’s why
item.description: Last year, pollution actually grew faster than economic activity. In a reversal from previous years’ pollution reductions, the United States spewed 2.4% more heat-trapping gases from the burning of fossil fuels in 2025 than in the year before, researchers calculated in a study released Tuesday.

item.title: Ce puissant laptop gaming Lenovo avec RTX 5070 + 32 Go de RAM se négocie à très bon prix pour les soldes
item.description: En ce moment, vous avez le PC portable gaming Lenovo Legion 5 15IRX10 pour 1 199,99 euros alors qu'il était proposé à 1 799,99 euros à sa sortie. Il y a déjà eu moins cher, mais ça reste un très bon prix compte tenu de la pénurie des composants.

item.title: Arc Raiders issues widespread penalties for alleged cheaters
item.description: 'Arc Raiders' issues widespread penalties for alleged cheaters

item.title: I finally found an IKEA standing desk that fixes the two major design flaws I hate most
item.description: The Utmaning standing desk from IKEA ticks all the boxes, from cables to comfort.

item.title: Mise à jour Google Home : 20 nouvelles fonctions débarquent, voici ce qui change
item.description: Google Home gagne de nouvelles options pour créer des règles d'automatisation. Les possibilités sont nombreuses.

item.title: BBC plans on asking Florida court to toss Trump’s $10 billion defamation lawsuit
item.description: Trump is suing the British broadcaster for defamation over the video editing of his speech on Jan. 6, 2021. The BBC plans to ask a court to throw out U.S. President Donald Trump’s $10 billion lawsuit against the British broadcaster, court papers show.Trump filed a lawsuit in December over the way the BBC edited a speech he gave on Jan. 6, 2021. The claim, filed in a Florida federal court, seeks $5 billion in damages for defamation and $5 billion for unfair trade practices.The speech took place before some of Trump’s supporters stormed the U.S. Capitol as Congress was poised to certify Preside...

item.title: Dozens of ICE Vehicles in Minnesota Lack ‘Necessary’ Lights and Sirens
item.description: A contract justification published in a federal register on Tuesday says that 31 ICE vehicles operating in the Twin Cities area “lack the necessary emergency lights and sirens” to be “compliant.”

item.title: Apple’s Big Virtual Reality NBA Game Debut Demands More Interactivity
item.description: A Vision Pro is way cheaper than courtside tickets, though Apple's headset could offer something beyond a good view.

item.title: Newcastle vs Man City Free Streams: How to watch Carabao Cup 2025-26 semi-final online from anywhere
item.description: All the ways to watch Newcastle vs Man City live streams, with both sides hoping to gain an advantage in the first leg of this Carabao Cup semi-final.

item.title: Tesla met à jour le Model Y 2026 aux US : les 3 nouveautés principales, avec le retour d’une option demandée
item.description: On attendait tous la version longue venue de Chine, la Model Y L. Finalement, Tesla joue la carte du recyclage. Le Model Y 7 places fait son retour aux États-Unis sur la version 2026.

item.title: 1Password launches Unified Access as a one-stop shop for managing company credentials – say goodbye to shadow IT and SaaS sprawl
item.description: Forget about shadow IT and SaaS sprawl - 1Password's Unified Access capabilities can discover credentials for you and creates a secure, compliant platform to manage your applications.
